name: Heroku
description: Integrate with Heroku to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Apps
tools.description: List all Heroku apps accessible to the authenticated user. Returns app names, regions, stacks, and last updated times.

tools.name: Get App
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Heroku app by name or ID.

tools.name: List Dynos
tools.description: List all dynos for a Heroku app. Returns dyno names, types, states, sizes, and commands.

tools.name: Restart Dyno
tools.description: Restart a specific dyno or all dynos for a Heroku app. If dynoIdOrName is omitted, all dynos are restarted.

tools.name: Get Config
tools.description: Get config vars (environment variables) for a Heroku app. Returns all key-value pairs. Sensitive values may be masked.
